title: Warship Island Arc Foreshadows Dragon Connections
summary: Some fans theorize that the Warship Island Arc's inclusion of dragons was intentional foreshadowing for later canon dragon appearances, particularly Punk Hazard.
fullText: While the Warship Island Arc is filler and creates continuity issues, some fans believe it may have been early foreshadowing for dragons appearing in the canon story later (such as the artificial dragon on Punk Hazard in the New World). The arc's focus on ancient, extinct dragon species could have been the anime staff's way of introducing the concept of dragons to viewers before they became relevant to the manga plot.
author: One Piece Fan Forums Discussion

source.title: Warship Island Arc - One Piece Wiki

title: Eric's Kama Kama no Mi Inspired Later Devil Fruits
summary: A theory that Eric's filler Devil Fruit may have inspired the design of later canon Devil Fruits with similar wind or cutting abilities.
fullText: Eric's Kama Kama no Mi, despite being a filler-only Devil Fruit, features wind-based cutting abilities that some fans believe may have influenced later canon fruits. The concept of using wind slashes as attacks appears in various forms throughout the series, and some theorize the anime staff's creation of this ability helped establish the concept in the One Piece universe.
author: Reddit Discussion Thread
